column1: Rudigar Bolger was a Hobbits of the Shire.
The son of Adalgar Bolger and husband of Belba Baggins
column2: Rudigar became head of the Bolger Family as the eldest heir. He had one son

column1: The name contains hrod "fame" and gar "spear".Jim Allan (ed.)
column3: "Giving of Names" It is the Middle High German form of Old English wikipedia:Hrothgar and modern Roger.
